description:
Install WordPress on Localhost | PC, Laptop or Mac & Move your localhost WordPress website to your shared hosting server / VPS

This course is all about how to install WordPress in your laptop as well as in your hosting server and how to transfer it from localhost to server.

You will also learn, where to get a free domain and a free hosting package to kick-start your learning process. Once you're comfortable with WordPress installation on your PC / free hosting, then if you want more speed and features you can move onto my list of recommended Premium hosting packages, with ease.

This course will also guide you on, how to move your working localhost website from your localhost (or one hosting provider to another) to your online server.

You can complete this course in a lunch break or a couple of tea breaks - It's just an hour course. This course is organised in the following manner:

> Course Introduction

> Install WordPress in your Laptop and Server using XAMPP (manually), Bitnami (automatic)

> Move your localhost website to Online hosting server

> Install WordPress in your Free hosting server

> Where to buy Paid Domain and Premium Hosting?

> Final Quiz

If you want to learn and try WordPress before you want to buy premium hosting package then the best way is to try installing WordPress in your laptop or desktop PC / Mac. This course will guide you to do that.
title: Install WordPress Locally + Move Localhost Website to Server
